mapper.select: select ly.*, y.name as name, u.nickname as owner, y.region as region, y.length as length, y.max_speed as max_speed, s.count as stock, w.wharf as wharf_name from leasing_yacht ly left join yacht y on y.id = ly.yacht_id left join wharf w on ly.wharf = w.id left join stock s on ly.yacht_id = s.id left join user u on y.owner_id = u.id;

select ly.*, y.name as name, u.nickname as owner, y.region as region, y.length as length, y.max_speed as max_speed, s.count as stock, w.wharf as wharf_name from leasing_yacht ly left join yacht y on y.id = ly.yacht_id left join wharf w on ly.wharf = w.id left join stock s on ly.yacht_id = s.id left join user u on y.owner_id = u.id where ly.yacht_id = #{id};
